divs: sighting detailsi left for my 3rd shift job at 10:16 p.m. and immediately noticed the objects\lights, while driving, for a period of approximately 22 minutes. they were below the clouds and stationary and brighter than any star. i initially thought the lights were planes that were coming straight for me but soon realized that they were hovering in place. i was in awe but didn't tell anyone other than my wife because i didn't want anyone else to think i was crazy. i lost sight of the lights when i had to report for work.
Summary: I left for work at approximately 10:16 p.m. and witnessed the lights on Guernsey Lake Rd (Delton) to Middleville, Mi.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Middleville
There were no other sightings in Middleville on or around March 11th 2012
